description:
Job Description Product Manager | Navi


Navi is looking for a Product Manager to own the Navi consumer website product. In this role, you will be responsible for the vision, roadmap, research, execution, and measurement of yournavi.com product features and enhancements. You will collaborate cross-functionally with Marketing, Design, and Engineering to deliver a best-in-class wireless comparative shopping experience creating consumer-centric products that make it easier for wireless shoppers to find and compare the best phone and plan deals across carriers.


Responsibilities:

  • Define the vision, strategy, and roadmap of product features to help drive consumer growth and align with core business goals
  • Work closely with Marketing, Design, and Engineering to identify opportunities for improvement and bring new product features to our website
  • Lead initiatives from concept through execution, launch, and optimization
  • Use various research and testing techniques to generate insights, make
  • data-driven choices, and maximize our key performance metrics
  • Identify consumer needs and pain points in the experience and translate those
  • insights into helpful product enhancements
  • Own accountability for measuring and reporting on website product
  • performance, including the impact on the business and our customers


Required skills:

  • A track record of product management success in fast-paced, dynamic, and agile environments working on a marketplace or e-commerce platform
  • Exceptional problem-solving skills with the ability to work both independently and collaborate as part of a team
  • Excellent interpersonal skills with a knack for influencing and quickly aligning a diverse group of stakeholders toward a common goal
  • Strong project management skills with the focus and flexibility to serve as both scrum master for tactical execution and the strategic thinker leading Navi’s .com consumer product strategy
  • Ability to multi-task and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment, driving and managing projects of varying size and complexity simultaneously
  • Excellent research, measurement, and reporting skills with a passion for using quantitative and qualitative data to guide product decisions and experience at the helm of research and analytics tools (e.g. Amplitude, HotJar, GA-4, Tableau)
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills to liaison with internal teams and present product initiatives and progress to executive team


Required Cultural Skills:

  • Flexibility and the willingness and ability to move fast
  • Curiosity: the desire to always learn and know more
  • Passion: to delight a customer, be part of creating an enduring new company
  • Supportive: the willingness to pitch in to help a teammate at the drop of a hat


Education & Experience:

  • Bachelor's degree and 5+ years of prior Product Management experience with at least 3 years working on a consumer or e-commerce platform
  • Telecommunications and/or consumer electronic industry experience is helpful, but not required


About Navi:

  • Navi is a remote early-stage start-up operating as Navi (www.yournavi.com). We're focused on creating a better consumer wireless experience by using our telecom know-how and big data expertise to solve many well-known industry pain points.
